recipe_name: Shaved fennel, herb and tomato salad
author: Nick Nairn
method: Place all of the ingredients into a large salad bowl and stir. To serve, place onto a serving dish.
ingredients: ½ fennel bulb, finely sliced,  ¼ ripe tomato, finely chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ lemon, zest and juice,  handful mixed fresh herbs, such as chives, chervil, parsley and basil, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
